onboarding.welcomeDesc: Discover local businesses, complete missions, and earn rewards while exploring your city. Let's get you started!
onboarding.completeMissionsDesc: Browse exciting missions from local businesses. Visit places, try new things, and earn points for every completed mission!
onboarding.exploreNearbyDesc: Use the map to discover businesses and missions near you. Filter by distance, category, and see real-time walking directions!
onboarding.joinMeetupsDesc: Squad up with friends or meet new people! Join group activities and team missions for bonus rewards.
onboarding.redeemRewardsDesc: Spend your points on exclusive discounts, free items, and special experiences from your favorite businesses!
onboarding.welcomeBonusDesc: You've earned 100 starter points! Use them to redeem your first reward or save up for something special.
onboarding.skipConfirm: Are you sure you want to skip the tutorial? You can always view it later in settings.
